page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT
page.content: We interviewed some teenagers who live in the area. some were unemployed but not on the Youth Training Scheme. One was receiving unemployment benifit and attended the job centre. Most still lived with there parents. We carried out a survey to find out about the type of work that adults in our area did to earn a living. We found that there was a high percentage of unemployed men in our area and also that there were lots of mothers who were trying to find work. Lots of mothers are housewives, looking after the babies and their homes, shopping and cooking. Some mothers do jobs at the home and some mothers have to go out to work to earn some money for the family or because of father is unemployed or does not live at home.
